reviewText: I was well pleased with this video. Of course I was aware of the content of the product before I purchased it. It was well represented.
If you like Mark Lowry and you like to have a good laugh then you need to buy this DVD. I laughed so much and enjoy watching it over and over again.

I bought this for my Dad who is terminal with Cancer to give him something to make him laugh and forget about the pain for a while.  It served that purpose beautifully.  Mark Lowry is a Christian comedian so if you are looking for contemporary raunch you will be disappointed.  If you want good clean comedy it is quite good.

I need a good laugh at the end of the day, after putting in some hard work, putting up with difficult people and situations, putting out some good food for dinner.  This hits the nail on the head, with good clean fun and inspiration.  Mark Lowry at his best, what a talent!
Vol 1 & 2, definately worth buying together.  I never laughed so hard or loud!!  Mark is awesome!

Mark Lowry is a very clever comedian, as well as an excellent singer, and this DVD focuses on his funny routines during the thirteen years he spent with the Gaither Vocal Band. The way it is presented, is that Mark and Bill Gaither are shown in a relaxed setting, as they sit and talk about the clips they show from the many Homecoming Series concerts around the country, as well as one in Ireland, and a short piece in England. It also includes some terrific music with the comedy, and my favorites are the two versions of "I'm Gonna Keep On", with Bill trying to sing the song while he is interrupted by bird calls and Mark's mischief; it's a terrific combination of wonderful music and harmonies, and at the same time totally hilarious.

There is also a clip from the Gospel Singing Jubilee, of Mark when he was a teenager, singing "If it Keeps Getting Better".

The final clip shows us Mark's remarkable vocal talent, as well as his songwriting skills, as he sings "Mary, Did You Know ?", which he co-wrote with Buddy Greene. It's a perfect song, performed with such feeling it is thrilling and fresh no matter how many times one hears it, and it never fails to bring a tear to my eye.

The DVD "extras" include twenty additional minutes of mostly music, with one song featuring Michael English.

Well edited, this is a fast moving one hour and thirty-five minute show, interesting as well amusing, with often laugh-out-loud humor. Good clean fun is hard to come by, and Mark is one of the best at it.
everything was good
Great DVD's!
Can't get enough of the Gaithers'  or the Vocal Band and many others  that make up the classic gospel singing groups.
Wonderful music
THIS GUY IS WAY TOO FUNNY . .. . AND IN A GREAT CLEAN WAY.  ALSO A VERY TALENTED INDIVIDUAL WHEN IT COMES TO MUSIC WRITING AND SINGING.
Funny tape.
Inspiring music and, as always, great performers.  Check out the Gaither Vocal Band CDs and DVDs.  SEB
nice
5 stars
excelente
So fun, love it!
Mark Lowry is hilarious. I greatly miss him in the GVB!
Too much talking... was not looking for the chit chat, wanted actual performances by Mark Lowry. I was looking for something to use at a church function, was really counting on this.

This is a great family video and you'll enjoy having lots of laughs and great music when you get Mark Lowry and Bill Gaither together!!!  We've watched it over and over while waiting in the school carlines!  Also, Volume Two is just as good!

I like Mark Lowry's clean humor and I like him better when he's with Bill Gaither as he is on this one.  When I watch his concerts I don't enjoy them as much as when he's playing "off" someone else..  My 12 year old granddaughter loves Mark.  Isn't it strange that a kid that age can watch something like this and I'm not afraid she'll be hear or see something that she shouldn't?  Great buy!

This DVD is truly the best of Mark Lowry, and it presents him in several ways.  As a comedian, he is funny, as a singer, he is excellent, and as a song writer he is superb.  The interviews with Bill Gaither are enlightening and hilarious.
Awesome, awesome, awesome!!!! What wonderful, clean, fun, family fare. All our children that are old enough, from thirteen down to 3 love Mark Lowery.
Mark Lowry is full of love, laughter and humor. His music reflects his true personality and the music is good too!
The DVD arrived right on time as stated. Was given as a gift and no complaints. Jean Combs said she loved it.

Mark Lowry is funny and very creative...you won't be able to stop laughing!
I own several of Marks DVDS and CDS...this is definitely one of his best.
Great DVD
Lots of good stuff
Mark Lowry at his best!
love it.i just love mark lowry because he is just so funny and hilarious.i laughed so hard watching this dvd and hoping to get volume 2 to watch.
Again, the antics between Mark Lowry and Bill Gaither continue to entertain and bring a lot of laughter.  The DVD was purchased for my mom, who enjoyed it immensely.
Awesome Music
My family and I had the best time watching this. I'm not sure who I watched more...the video or my kids laughing so hard. What a great family fun show!
Loved it!!!!!!!!
